major_augments.title: Probiotic
major_augments.description: Slightly increase maximum health with Jugger-Nog.

major_augments.title: Turtle Shell
major_augments.description: Armor acts as a shield on your back, completely absorbing damage to your back. No damage mitigation when hit from the front.

major_augments.title: Reactive Armor
major_augments.description: When an armor plate breaks, nearby normal enemies are stunned for a short time.

minor_augments.title: Retaliation
minor_augments.description: Deal bonus damage while health is low.

minor_augments.title: Hardened Plates
minor_augments.description: Armor plates have more damage mitigation.

minor_augments.title: Durable Plates
minor_augments.description: Slightly increase armor durability.

major_augments.title: Free Faller
major_augments.description: Become immune to fall damage.

major_augments.title: Dasher
major_augments.description: Increase Tactical Sprint duration.

major_augments.title: Stalker
major_augments.description: Walk faster while aiming.

minor_augments.title: Hard Target
minor_augments.description: While Tactical Sprinting, projectile damage is reduced.

minor_augments.title: QuarterBack
minor_augments.description: Use equipment while sprinting.

minor_augments.title: Hot Foot
minor_augments.description: Gain a speed boost after your equipment kills an enemy.

perks.name: Speed Cola
perks.description: Reload weapons and replate armor faster.

major_augments.title: SuperCharged
major_augments.description: Field Upgrades recharge a bit faster.

major_augments.title: Classic Formula
major_augments.description: Reload speed is even faster.

major_augments.title: Phantom Reload
major_augments.description: Weapon magazines are slowly refilled over time.

minor_augments.title: Speedy Roulette
minor_augments.description: The Mystery Box settles much faster.

minor_augments.title: Quick Swap
minor_augments.description: Swap weapons faster.

minor_augments.title: Fast Pitcher
minor_augments.description: Deploy equipment faster.

perks.name: Deadshot Daiquiri
perks.description: Drink to improve ADS precision and increase critical damage.

major_augments.title: Dead Head
major_augments.description: Further increase in critical damage.

major_augments.title: Dead First
major_augments.description: Deal double critical damage if an enemy is at full health.

major_augments.title: Dead Again
major_augments.description: Critical hits have a chance of adding a bullet to your magazine.

minor_augments.title: Dead Break
minor_augments.description: Increase damage to armor pieces.

minor_augments.title: Dead Draw
minor_augments.description: Reduce hip-fire spread.

minor_augments.title: Dead Set
minor_augments.description: Reduce gun movement while performing advanced movement.

perks.name: Quick Revive
perks.description: Recover health and revive allies faster.

major_augments.title: EMT
major_augments.description: Reviving an ally allows them to keep all of the Perks on their bleed-out bar.

major_augments.title: Equivalent Exchange
major_augments.description: Killing an enemy while downed will revive you and remove Quick Revive. This can be done up to three times.

major_augments.title: Dying Wish
major_augments.description: On lethal damage, become immune to all damage for two seconds and keep one health. Quick Revive is removed on use.

minor_augments.title: Swift Recovery
minor_augments.description: Reviving an ally increases both of your movement speeds for a short time.

minor_augments.title: Karmic Return
minor_augments.description: Reviving an ally heals you to full health.

minor_augments.title: Slow Death
minor_augments.description: Increase your time in last stand.

perks.name: Elemental Pop
perks.description: Attacks can trigger random Ammo Mods.

major_augments.title: Citrus Focus
major_augments.description: If a weapon has an Ammo Mod applied, Elemental Pop will only activate that one.

major_augments.title: Imperil Peach
major_augments.description: Enemies that hit you have a chance to trigger a random Ammo Mod.

major_augments.title: Electric Cherry
major_augments.description: Reloading creates an electric damage discharge that damages and stuns nearby normal enemies. The emptier the magazine, the stronger the damage.

minor_augments.title: Vulnera Bean
minor_augments.description: Slightly increase enemy elemental weakness damage.

minor_augments.title: Pineapple Blast
minor_augments.description: Equipment can also trigger a random Ammo Mod.

minor_augments.title: Chill Berry
minor_augments.description: Slightly reduce all Ammo Mod cooldowns.

perks.name: PHD Flopper
perks.description: Explosive dive to prone and immunity to self-inflicted explosive damage.

major_augments.title: Gravity MD
major_augments.description: Just falling from heights creates explosions.

major_augments.title: Dr RAM
major_augments.description: Tactical Sprint knocks down and damages base zombies.

major_augments.title: PHD Slider
major_augments.description: Sliding into enemies triggers explosions.

minor_augments.title: Environmentalist
minor_augments.description: Become immune to environmental damage while sliding.

minor_augments.title: EOD Technician
minor_augments.description: Slightly reduce height and distance requirements for explosions.

minor_augments.title: Tribologist
minor_augments.description: Sliding distance and speed are increased.

perks.name: Melee Macchiato
perks.description: Replace weapon gun butt with a deadly punch.

major_augments.title: Expresso
major_augments.description: All melee attacks are slightly faster.

major_augments.title: Vampiric Extraction
major_augments.description: Melee attacks heal a small amount of your health.

major_augments.title: Triple Shot
major_augments.description: Your punch can hit multiple enemies at once.

minor_augments.title: Stick m' Move
minor_augments.description: Backpedal speed is increased after a successful melee attack.

minor_augments.title: Strenght Training
minor_augments.description: Your punch can one-hit kill normal enemies for longer.

minor_augments.title: Hidden Impact
minor_augments.description: Melee kills reload a portion of your held weapon.

perks.name: Vulture Aid
perks.description: Increase the variety of loot dropped by enemies

major_augments.title: Fetid Upgr-aid
major_augments.description: On death, zombies have a chance to create a gas cloud that charges your Field Upgrade.

major_augments.title: Smell of Death
major_augments.description: On death, zombies have a chance to create a gas cloud that conceals you while standing in it.

major_augments.title: Parting Gift
major_augments.description: Vulture Aid ammo drops give more ammo to Wonder Weapons.

minor_augments.title: Condor's Reach
minor_augments.description: Auto-pickup loot from farther away.

minor_augments.title: Carrion Luggage
minor_augments.description: Critical kills have a chance to drop extra Salvage.

minor_augments.title: Picky Eater
minor_augments.description: On death, zombies have a higher chance of dropping your current equipment.
